definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc

sentences.english: He sees a pharmacy on the side of the road, so he stops his scooter and walks inside.
sentences.chinese: 他在路邊看到一家藥局，於是他停下車走了進去。

sentences.english: A man walks into a drug store with his 8-year old son.
sentences.chinese: 黃爸爸帶著他的8歲小兒子到藥局。

sentences.english: This is the prescription for your discharged medicines. Please go to Satellite Pharmacy to receive your medicine.
sentences.chinese: 這是住院出院帶藥處方籤，請至病房衛星藥局領藥。

sentences.english: Do you have a drug store here ?
The smell of the old pharmacy makes me feel like vomiting.
sentences.chinese: 這間老藥局的味道讓我很想吐。

sentences.english: This is the pharmacy. Would you like to receive your medicine?
sentences.chinese: 藥局就在這裏，您需要領藥嗎？

sentences.english: Will any problems be encountered if drugs are delivered to pharmacies via the postal service?
sentences.chinese: 郵寄藥品到藥局的過程會不會出問題？

sentences.english: Now I work as a staff pharmacist in a local drug store.
sentences.chinese: 現在我在一個本地的藥局擔任藥劑師工作。

sentences.english: The first drive-through pharmacy in Britain has opened in a former McDonald's store.
sentences.chinese: 英國首間得來速藥局，已經在一家麥當勞舊址內開幕。

sentences.english: Please take the prescription and go to the pharmacy to take your medicine.
sentences.chinese: 請拿著處方籤去藥局領你的藥。

sentences.english: I don't really want to work at a pharmacy Mom.
sentences.chinese: 可是，媽，我並不想在藥局工作。

definition: Luodong or Lotong town in Yilan county 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 xian4], Taiwan
Neihu district of Taipei City 臺北市|台北市[Tai2 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
market/store/mall (usually specializing in a particular product category such as furniture)
Dounan or Tounan town in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan
ginseng and young deer antler (used in TCM)
Chaochou town in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
